message.entry: Internal error while closing the DataQueue: {0}
Failed to load the DataQueue. A DataQueue can only be loaded in a MATLAB client or one of its pool workers if any of these created it.
Invalid PollableDataQueue. PollableDataQueues become invalid when used with some features including save, load, spmdSend, spmdReceive, the ValueStore or the FileStore.
Internal error while checking whether DataQueue is closed: {0}
DataQueue に必要な並列プールが実行されていません。
メッセージは、キューを作成したものと同じ MATLAB クライアントまたはプール ワーカーによってのみ受け取ることができます。
データを DataQueue に送信中に内部エラーが発生しました: {0}
Unable to use DataQueue in nested process pool (thread worker in a process pool).
Failed to retrieve data from the sender because: {0}
Failed to retrieve data because the connection to the sending worker was lost, potentially due to network problems, or a crash of that worker.
Failed to retrieve data because the sender is not a part of a currently open parallel pool. Call poll on the client to retrieve all messages from the workers before closing a pool.
Failed to send data because the DataQueue has been closed.
DataQueue construction must not have additional arguments. Use D = parallel.pool.DataQueue.
